name: Dungeon of Doom (ROM16)
description:
Welcome to Dungeon of Doom! A fun, fast paced Retro Dungeon Crawler. Make your way through multiple dungeons as you use your wits to try and survive one of the hardest retro-style games you will probably ever play! Can you make it out of the Dungeon of Doom? Or will you choose to carry on and hit a new high score!?

This is a small project that was worked on over the space of a few weeks by a very small indie development team of two people, big thanks and shoutout to both Liam and Matthew Goulding for all of their time and effort! We hope you enjoy!

NOTE: If you have any spare change you would like to throw our way, we would definitely appreciate it! We're a very small indie team that just enjoys making retro style video games, the money would go soley towards making new games and new content! 

GAME CONTENT

Controls - Move (Arrow Keys),  Attack (X),  Pause Game (ESC) 

HP (Current Health Points)

DEF (Current Armour Defence) 

XP (Your Score and High Score)
